name: cncf-interactive-landscape
description: Interactive visualization of cloud native projects and products

scripts.open:src: export PROJECT_PATH="$PWD";cd node_modules/interactive-landscape; npm run yaml2json && babel-node tools/srcServer.js
scripts.fetch: babel-node tools/validateLandscapeKeys && babel-node tools/addExternalInfo.js && npm run yaml2json
scripts.update: (rm /tmp/landscape.json || true) && babel-node tools/validateLandscapeKeys && npm run remove-quotes && LEVEL=medium babel-node tools/addExternalInfo.js && npm run yaml2json
scripts.yaml2json: export PROJECT_PATH="$PWD"; cd node_modules/interactive-landscape; babel-node tools/generateJson.js
scripts.prebuild: npm config set scripts-prepend-node-path true && npm run fetch && npm run clean-dist
scripts.copy-dist: cp -r _headers _redirects src/data.json src/images src/embed.html ./dist/ && cp -r cached_logos ./dist/logos
scripts.quick-build: babel-node tools/build.js && npm run copy-dist && npm run setup-robots
scripts.build: babel-node tools/build.js && npm run copy-dist && npm run setup-robots && npm run start-ci && npm run integration-test && npm run check-landscape && npm run render-landscape && npm run stop-ci && babel-node tools/fundingForMasterBranch

author: CNCF
